item.title: By: Jon Peltier
item.dc:creator: Jon Peltier
item.description:
"Even more complex formatting options mean a greater chance to use them poorly"
Instead of making it hard or impossible to do bad things, they keep making it easier. Oh well....
item.content:encoded:
“Even more complex formatting options mean a greater chance to use them poorly”

Instead of making it hard or impossible to do bad things, they keep making it easier. Oh well….

item.title: By: Ashley Margolis
item.dc:creator: Ashley Margolis
item.description: looks promising, i just bought office 2007 under this corporate discount, just so ican get used to this new ribbon interface. .. am just hoping that this version is not too much of a hog, resource wise (ok , I am dreaming ..) on my aging pc that is struggling with this @#$# Vista .. :-)
